Text: School of Alternatives:  It is located on old US 19/23 in the Addie Community and the playgrounds border Scotts Creek.

Text: School of Alternatives:  When it opened it was a state-of-the-art facility, and didn't require blinds because the building was positioned at such an angle that the sun would always be overhead and would never directly shine into the classrooms windows.
